originalText.text: Biggest waste of money first the hair had black hair dye so much to the point I had to wash it 6 times and waste 3 bottles of shampoo to get it out. The hair feels hard like if I had it for more than 5 years when it suppose to be brand new. is sheds like no tomorrow and tangles to the point you have to take 30 minutes combing it everyday in the morning in the night and throughout the day is the worst hair. I have gotten better hair from ebay!

originalText.text: It's okay, the hair is pretty good. The amount of time they make you wait for it, its unbelievable though. Overall , its alright, I just care about the hair being good. The price its okay too. I bought 20 inch hair for 180, 3 ounces.
